Class Song

  • java.lang.Object
    • Song

  • public class Song
extends java.lang.Object
    The Song class represents a song. Each song has a title, artist, play time, and file path. Here is an example of how a song can be created. 
     Song song = new Song("Amsterdam", "Paul Oakenfold", 318, "sounds/Amsterdam.mp3");
    Here is an example of how a song can be used. 
     System.out.println("Artist: " + song.getArtist());
 System.out.println(song);
    Author:
    CS121 Instructors
